rev.comment: /* Weeks 1 - 4 (October 10 - November 6) */ remove relatively-less important video to tidy as per talk-- video is still on chronolog page

Line 154: Line 154:
Occupy Oakland began at 4 p.m. on October 10, 2011, with a rally attended by hundreds of supporters. Occupy Oaklandâs first rally, in which they occupied Frank Ogawa Plaza, was held in tandem with [[Indigenous People's Day]], both as a statement of solidarity and an expression that this action firmly situated itself against colonialism and nation states.{{citation needed|date=October 2011}} A couple dozen protesters set up tents that evening.<ref name=oct11sfgate />

On Oct 14, protesters participated in a short march during rush hour.<ref>{{cite news|last=Quintana|first=Sergio|title=Occupy Oakland holds short march during rush hour|url=http://abclocal.go.com/kgo/story?section=news/local/east_bay&id=8392891|accessdate=October 18, 2011|newspaper=KGO|date=October 15, 2011}}</ref> The following weekend, around 2,500 people, including actor [[Danny Glover]], came out for a Saturday march and rally to show their support for Occupy Oakland.<ref>{{cite news|title=Organizers say thousands took part in Oakland rally|url=http://www.ktvu.com/news/29497557/detail.html|accessdate=October 18, 2011|newspaper=KTVU|date=October 15, 2011}}</ref> On October 17, the [[2009â2011 detention of American hikers by Iran|three American hikers recently freed from an Iranian prison]] made their first West Coast speaking appearance at Occupy Oakland, drawing an audience of around 300 people. <ref>{{cite news
On Oct 14, protesters participated in a short march during rush hour.<ref>{{cite news|last=Quintana|first=Sergio|title=Occupy Oakland holds short march during rush hour|url=http://abclocal.go.com/kgo/story?section=news/local/east_bay&id=8392891|accessdate=October 18, 2011|newspaper=KGO|date=October 15, 2011}}</ref> The following weekend, around 2,500 people, including actor [[Danny Glover]], came out for a Saturday march and rally to show their support for Occupy Oakland.<ref>{{cite news|title=Organizers say thousands took part in Oakland rally|url=http://www.ktvu.com/news/29497557/detail.html|accessdate=October 18, 2011|newspaper=KTVU|date=October 15, 2011}}</ref> On October 17, the [[2009â2011 detention of American hikers by Iran|three American hikers recently freed from an Iranian prison]] made their first West Coast speaking appearance at Occupy Oakland, drawing an audience of around 300 people. <ref>{{cite news
